Package project

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
project.Staff
project.Admin
public class Admin extends Staff
The Admin class represents an administrative staff member who has privileges to perform administrative tasks such as editing staff accounts, managing payments, and filtering staff information.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class project.Staff

  • Constructor Details

    • Admin

      public Admin(String name, String loginID, Staff.Gender gender, int age, String branch, Staff.Role role, String password)
      Constructs an Admin object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the admin.
      loginID - The login ID of the admin.
      gender - The gender of the admin.
      age - The age of the admin.
      branch - The branch to which the admin belongs.
      role - The role of the admin (STAFF or MANAGER).
      password - The password of the admin.

  • Method Details

    • editStaffAccount

      public static void editStaffAccount(Branch branch, Scanner sc)
      Allows the admin to edit staff accounts by adding, editing or removing staff members.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch where the staff accounts are managed.
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.

    • promoteToBranchManager

      public static boolean promoteToBranchManager(String staffName, Branch branch)
      Promotes a staff member to the role of branch manager if quota conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      staffName - The name of the staff member to be promoted.
      branch - The branch where the staff member is employed.
      Returns:
      True if the promotion is successful, false otherwise.

    • quotaOfManager

      public static int quotaOfManager(int numOfStaffs)
      Determines the quota of managers based on the number of staff members in a branch.
      Parameters:
      numOfStaffs - The number of staff members in the branch.
      Returns:
      The quota of managers for the branch.

    • editPayment

      public static void editPayment(Scanner sc)
      Allows the admin to edit payment methods by adding or removing payment options.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.

    • transferStaff

      public static boolean transferStaff(String staffName, String sourceBranchName, String destinationBranchName)
      Transfers a staff member from one branch to another, subject to quota conditions.
      Parameters:
      staffName - The name of the staff member to be transferred.
      sourceBranchName - The name of the source branch.
      destinationBranchName - The name of the destination branch.
      Returns:
      True if the transfer is successful, false otherwise.

    • filter

      public static void filter(Scanner sc)
      Allows the admin to filter staff members based on different criteria.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.
